title: ‘It was like a sledgehammer’: Watch the incredible moment a man is struck by LIGHTNING and survives… and he claims the bolt gave him superhuman strength and the power to to …
content:
A man who survived being hit by lightning claims the ‘life-changing’ experience made him psychic and gave him the ability to ‘hear’ people’s thoughts. A video of the terrifying moment Australian photographer Brian Skinner was hit by lightning has …
